data.name: Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu
data.description:
Step into your own Kung Fu movie with legendary characters inspired by martial arts movies across the decades. Whether you fancy playing as an old wise master, a young gifted female kung fu student, a Shaolin monk, a Bruce Lee inspired character, a samurai, or a ninja -- there's bound to be someone for you.

Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu features both single and multiplayer modes! Play solo in a full campaign featuring multiple levels, unlockable characters, diverse game modes, and training areas. Play up to 8 person multiplayer with PVP, Co-op, and other multiplayer gamemodes.  

Face opponents wielding real-world martial arts techniques, each with a unique style. Learn to react and anticipate their attacks, countering and striking back with your unique style. Using real pressure points and physics, you have full control over how you'll defeat your enemies. Remember: All opponents have the same control as you!

Choose from over 40 different characters that have various colorful costumes and their own special moves to learn and use. Every character has their own fighting style to master as well as their own perks and weaknesses.

With full integration of bHaptics in Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu, experience every kick, punch, and special ability like never before. Put on your favorite bHaptics gear and experience the true power of your opponents!
